amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Food for Peace Title II Grants account by $100 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Food for Peace Title II Grants account by $100 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 300 (Roll no. 433).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House

House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Gosar.
